effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their accuracy.
